Class Receiver

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.weapons.rangedweapons.mods.RangedMod
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.weapons.rangedweapons.mods.Receiver
public class Receiver extends RangedMod
Represents a receiver modification for a ranged weapon.

  • Constructor Details

    • Receiver

      public Receiver(String name, ReceiverType receiverType, double damageChange, int damageCriticalMultiplier, int fireRateChange, int accuracyChange, double apChange, boolean isPrime, String ammoOverrideType)
      The constructor for a receiver.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the receiver. The user will be able to see the given value.
      receiverType - The type of receiver. This is used for various Modifier conditions.
      damageChange - The additive Double value that will be applied to the BonusDamageService.
      damageCriticalMultiplier - The Integer value that will be made to the critical damage.
      fireRateChange - The modification made to the weapons base rate of fire.
      accuracyChange - The modification made to the weapons base accuracy.
      apChange - The modification made to the weapons base action points usage.
      isPrime - Determines if the receiver is a prime receiver or not.
      ammoOverrideType - The ammo the weapon uses if the receiver changes from the base value.
